name: Magical Chase GB [GBC]
description:
Magical Chase (マジカルチェイス) is a Shoot 'Em Up video game published by PalSoft released on 1991 for the TurboGrafx-16.

Magical Chase GB: Minarai Mahoutsukai Kenja no Tani e (マジカルチェイスGB ～見習い魔法使い 賢者の谷へ) is a Action/Shoot 'Em Up/Shooter video game published by Micro Cabin released on August 4th, 2000 for the GBC.
